name: Balloon Decor
overview:
Balloon Decor have been enhancing venues since 1989 and are one of the most experienced event decorating companies. Providing contemporary balloon displays and a variety of centerpiece’s that can compliment any venue, Karen Hawes and her experienced team have gone from strength to strength, having decorated thousands of functions from small village hall weddings to The Great Room at Grosvenor House Hotel, the largest ballroom in Europe.

Through an initial free consultation at our studio, where ideas are exchanged and expectations discussed, We will create exactly the right atmosphere in an elegant and tasteful way.

Our professional service and commitment to high standards of quality come recommended by many venues, countless brides and many corporate clients who know the importance of entrusting the right company with such a special task.
